description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(738).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,326,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (27 + 163*x + 27*x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 326*x^2 + x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 24 2013a(n) = 326*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 24 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[738], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(27 + 163 x + 27 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 326 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 24 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[27,163,8829,53137]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 326*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 24 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
